## Live in London

I live in a flat in Lisson Grove with three undergraduate friends (2 [MFAs](https://www.london.edu/masters-degrees/masters-in-financial-analysis) and 1 [GMiM](https://www.london.edu/masters-degrees/global-masters-in-management)). I love the view outside my window, especially in sunny afternoons.
